item.title: Both sides of the aisle hate the AI moratorium

If you're a subscriber, you are stalwart and true, and if you're here from the internet, prove your chivalry and worth by subscribing to The Verge here. item.title: 13 Burning Questions When ‘Stranger Things 5’ Returns for Part 2
item.description: The Duffer Brothers' hit drops more episodes—and hopefully some answers to the below—December 25 on Netflix.

item.title: Forget the Apple Watch SE 3 – It looks like a big sequel to our best-ever cheap fitness watch has just leaked
item.description: Amazfit’s Active Max smartwatch just got leaked, providing new info and photos on the affordable device.

item.title: Somehow, this AI-generated McDonald’s ad about hating Christmas was a flop
item.description: If you're having a stressful holiday season, the answer is McDonald's - at least, that's what a now-removed AI-generated ad suggested, as reported by Futurism. Set to a song calling holiday season "the most terrible time of the year," the ad shows AI-generated people falling victim to a slew of wintery woes, including family dinners, […]

item.title: Google is powering a new US military AI platform
item.description: The Department of Defense is announcing its own "bespoke" AI platform, GenAI.mil, and Google Cloud's Gemini will be the first AI tool available on it, according to a press release. Secretary of Defense Pete Hegseth (who has dubbed himself Secretary of War, though the name has not been legally changed by Congress) promised that the […]

item.title: How to watch Bigg Boss Telugu season 9 online from anywhere
item.description: Kalyan is the first Ranarangam finalist, thanks to Rithu's inability to perform basic arithmetic. Here's how to watch Bigg Boss Telugu season 9 from anywhere.

item.title: Man attempts to break world record with $75 million domain name pitch, ends up empty handed instead
item.description: Judge hands Lambo.com to Lamborghini after ruling the owner who tried to sell it for $75 million acted in bad faith.

item.title: ‘The Odyssey’ Will Drop an Epic Prologue in IMAX Theaters This Weekend
item.description: Go see 'One Battle After Another' or 'Sinners' in 70mm IMAX, and you'll get an extended peek at Christopher Nolan's 2026 release.

item.description: "We are pushing all of our chips in on artificial intelligence as a fighting force," Hegseth said.

item.title: The 'world’s first' 1,000Hz dual-mode gaming monitors are coming — but they sound completely unnecessary
item.description: Philips and AOC are pushing refresh rates on monitors to an unexpected level, with two 1,000Hz displays potentially launching in 2026.

item.title: Fal nabs $140M in fresh funding led by Sequoia, tripling valuation to $4.5B
item.description: The round, which was Fal’s third fundraise this year, also included a secondary sale for early investors, sources tell us.

item.title: Cashew Research is going after the $90B market research industry with AI
item.description: Cashew Research uses AI to automate the market research process while still collecting real-world data from humans.

item.title: Uber is installing kiosks for booking rides without the mobile app
item.description: Uber is rolling out kiosks for travelers to book rideshares without using the mobile app. The company is pitching the service as a convenience for international travelers who may not have a data plan, but it could also be a lifesaver if your phone runs out of juice and you don't have a way to recharge it. A passenger can use the kiosk to enter their destination and desired ride type, then will receive a printed receipt with the details about their booked ride. The first kiosk will debut in Terminal C at LaGuardia Airport in New York City, but Uber said it would have additional locations in air...

item.title: Instagram is generating SEO-bait headlines for its users' posts
item.description: It looks like Meta has decided to turn Instagram users into unwitting SEO spam pawns. On Tuesday, 404 Media reported that the platform is generating sensational, likely AI-generated headlines and descriptions for user posts without their knowledge or explicit consent. An Engadget editor has also noticed this on their posts. The headlines are found in the pages’ code and are only visible in search results.The scheme appears to be an effort to boost the Google search ranking of Instagram content. An Instagram post by Engadget’s Sam Chapman, about a board game he created, received an unwanted gen...

item.title: Slack's CEO is joining OpenAI to find the money to pay for all those data centers
item.description: OpenAI has announced that Denise Dresser, the current CEO of Slack, will be the company's new Chief Revenue Officer. Dresser will oversee the company's revenue strategy "across enterprise and customer success," according to OpenAI's announcement, and will presumably play a key role in leading the company towards profitability now that it's reorganized as a public benefit corporation."We're on a path to put AI tools into the hands of millions of workers, across every industry," Fidji Simo, OpenAI's CEO of Products said in the announcement. "Denise has led that kind of shift before, and her expe...

item.description: He does what he pleases, after all.

item.description: Salesforce raises forecasts - Agentforce credited as driving force

item.title: Australia’s social media ban goes into effect Wednesday
item.description: Other nations could be close behind. On Wednesday morning, local time, over one million Australian children discovered their social media accounts had vanished. And it may not be long before kids in other countries find themselves in a similar predicament.

item.description: How to watch NBA for free. Live stream Toronto Raptors vs. New York Knicks in the NBA Cup for free from anywhere in the world.

item.title: Sam Altman tells Jimmy Fallon that AI is the 'equalizing force' the world needs
item.description: Sam Altman went on the Tonight Show to tout ChatGPT’s unprecedented potential but also urged caution about AI adoption.

item.title: Newly Discovered ‘Hybrid’ Phase of Matter Blurs the Line Between Solid and Liquid
item.description: During this phase, matter exists in a weird, precarious limbo that ultimately determines what it becomes.

item.title: DJI’s terrifying new delivery drone is its most powerful so far – the FlyCart 100 can carry 100kg loads and climb 6,000m mountains
item.description: DJI has launched the FlyCart 100 drone for delivering heavy packages in the most difficult environments.

item.title: Exclusive: Hinge CEO Justin McLeod steps down
item.description: McLeod grew Hinge into a bright spot for the dating-app industry and parent company Match Group. He’s succeeded as CEO by Jackie Jantos, Hinge president and CMO. Justin McLeod, founder and CEO of dating app Hinge, is consciously uncoupling from his app. Hinge’s president and chief marketing officer Jackie Jantos—recently named one of Fast Company’s CMOs of the year—will succeed him in the role of CEO, effective immediately. McLeod will stay on as an adviser through March to support the transition. ...

item.title: SpaceX reportedly planning 2026 IPO with $1.5T valuation target
item.description: The company is looking to raise $30 billion, which would make it the biggest IPO ever, just ahead of Saudi Aramco's in 2019.
